title: NY Yankees font
content:
Does anyone know what the typeface is for the NY Yankees???

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227021906im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ny_yankees_3608.jpeg.jpg)
author: maladesai

comments.content: Although this looks really neat, I believe this is handwritten.

The "TM" is your clue that this will be custom. It seems there are very few connected scripts with this style of N, and I couldn't find anything to offer as a good approximation of this logo script.

- Mike Yanega
